scripts.build-wc: npm run build-wc:clean && npm run build-wc:native && concurrently "npm:build-wc:react" "npm:build-wc:vue" "npm:build-wc:angular" "npm:build-wc:stencil"
scripts.build-wc:react: cd web-components/react-contact-list && npm run build-wc && cp dist/react-contact-list* ../../dist
scripts.build-wc:native: cd web-components/native-web-components && npm run build-wc && cp dist/native-web-components-*.js ../../dist
scripts.build-wc:vue: cd web-components/vue-login && npm run wc && npm run build-wc && cp dist/vue-login.js ../../dist/vue-login.js
scripts.build-wc:angular: cd web-components/angular-chat-window && npm run build-wc && cp dist/angular-chat-window.js ../../dist/angular-chat-window.js
scripts.build-wc:stencil: cd web-components/stencil-components && npm run wc && npm run build-wc && cp -r stencil-dist ../../dist && cp -r loader ../../dist
